column2: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS

night.
Fairly heavy falls above 50 mm are likely at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa, Uva and Southern
provinces.

howers may occur in Western province and in Galle, Matara and Puttalam districts in the morning.
